description: You are given a 0-indexed n x n grid where n is odd, and grid[r][c] is 0, 1, or 2. We say that a cell belongs to the Letter Y if it belongs to one of the following: The Letter Y is written on the grid if and only if: Return the minimum number of operations needed to write the letter Y on the grid given that in one operation you can change the value at any cell to 0, 1, or 2.
